text:
February 18, 1969
Mr. John Macy, Jr.
President
Corporation for Public Broadcasting
Suite 630
1250 Connecticut Avenue, N. W.
Washington, D. C. 20036
Dear Mr. Macy:
A list of educational radio stations is attached.
The radio stations were selected because of their
proximity to educational television stations and
because they are in cities of residence of CPB
Board members.
A visit to the stations will provide an overview of
educational radio. I would categorize the stations
selected as above average. I have limited knowledge
of the stations in Providence, Rhode Island, Houston,
Texas and Atlanta, Georgia.
If we can be of further assistance please let us
know.
Sincerely,
Robert A. Mott
RAM: lkl
Enclosure
